capitalist.translation[0].definitions[1]: someone who owns or controls a lot of money and lends it to businesses, banks etc to produce more wealth
capitalist.translation[2].definitions[0]: The country has really changed; it’s OK to be a capitalist now.
capitalist.translation[2].definitions[1]: someone who owns or controls a lot of money and lends it to businesses to create more wealth
The country has finally captured foreign capitalists’ attention, if not yet their investment.
capitalist.translation[3].definitions[0]: leaders of the Group of Seven largest capitalist democracies
Beijing agreed to maintain Hong Kong’s capitalist system for at least 50 years.
